attributes.action: WE ARE FED UP. Legalise Cannabis for goodness sakes!
attributes.additional_details:
If you consider yourself a being able to research, intake & analyse data independent of media & morally imposed GOVERNMENTAL ideologies then continue reading...

As much as i would like to go into how police time is wasted, how it could reduce crime, be used for medicinal purposes, and analyse the physiological effects of it (all of which you can google yourselves) i will say this...

WHY do we allow our government  to impose the morals created by peoples of our past who had no science to back there criminalisation of cannabis. AND EVEN NOW we as a more rational society has SOLID scientific evidence we still allow our government to feed us lies & think for us (and that applies to more than just cannabis use). It was once legal to own a slave does that mean it was morally right?!?!?!?!

read this: http://www.idmu.co.uk/historical.htm

Coming to this conclusion through extensive research on the subject has opened my eyes.
"IF YOU ARE NOT ANGRY YOU ARE NOT PAYING ATTENTION"
